All Backgrounds in Baldurs Gate 3 Character Creation

Backgrounds determine each character's starting Proficiencies and will affect the success of their interactions in game. All Backgrounds will be available regardless of which Race or Class is chosen.

Acolyte: Insight Proficiency, Religion Proficiency Charlatan: Deception Proficiency, Sleight of Hand Proficiency
